title: Act 2009 (No. 15 of 2009), being satisfied that subsection 5A(a) of that section
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Nursing Homes Support Scheme
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Nursing Homes Support Scheme 

Act 2009 (Relevant Payments) Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited nursing home support scheme act 2009 (relevant payments) regulation 2025

title: Act 2009 (No. 15 of 2009), being satisfied that subsection 5A(a) of that section
heading: 2. These Regulations shall be deemed to have come into operation on 9
text_raw:
2. These Regulations shall be deemed to have come into operation on 9 

August 2024.
text_norm: 2 regulation shall deemed come operation 9 august 2024

title: Act 2009 (No. 15 of 2009), being satisfied that subsection 5A(a) of that section
heading: In these Regulations “the Act of 2009” means the Nursing Homes
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations “the Act of 2009” means the Nursing Homes 

Support Scheme Act 2009 (No. 15 of 2009).
text_norm: 3 regulation act 2009 mean nursing home support scheme act 2009 (no 15 2009)

title: Act 2009 (No. 15 of 2009), being satisfied that subsection 5A(a) of that section
heading: 4. The classes of ex gratia payment or payments specified in the Schedule
text_raw:
4. The classes of ex gratia payment or payments specified in the Schedule 
to these Regulations are prescribed for the purposes of paragraph (f) of the 
definition of “relevant payment” in paragraph 1 of Part 3 of Schedule 1 of the 
Act of 2009.
text_norm: 4 class ex gratia payment payment specified schedule regulation prescribed purpose paragraph (f) definition relevant payment paragraph 1 part 3 schedule 1 act 2009

heading: 1. A payment or payments made to the person under the Residential
text_raw:
1. A payment or payments made to the person under the Residential 

Institutions Redress Acts 2002 to 2011.

title: Act 2009 (No. 15 of 2009), being satisfied that subsection 5A(a) of that section
heading: 2. A payment or payments made to the person under the terms of the
text_raw:
2. A payment or payments made to the person under the terms of the 
Stardust ex gratia Redress Scheme 2024 and otherwise referred to as the Stardust 
Redress Scheme. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 March, 2025. 

JENNIFER CARROLL MACNEILL, 

Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 28th March, 2025.

title: Act 2009 (No. 15 of 2009), being satisfied that subsection 5A(a) of that section
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations prescribe ex gratia payments for the purposes of paragraph 
(f) of the definition of “relevant payment” in paragraph 1 of Part 3 of Schedule 
1 of the Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 2009 (No. 15 of 2009). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [91]
